imdb.plot outline: A Black widowed pastor, retires from the church ministry, to raise his teenage daughter and give guidance to his wayward college student son. His overbearing sister-in-law moves in to help Charles raise his teenage daughter. Until he finds a suitable new wife. Ex parishioners just show up to ask for worldly and spiritual advice. And against his better judgement Spud gets involved. When Pastor Charles gets pulled in ALL directions, and is at the end of his wit he cries out'Hep Me Jesus".
imdb.title: Hep Me Jesus
plot: A Black widowed pastor, retires from the church ministry, to raise his teenage daughter and give guidance to his wayward college student son. His overbearing sister-in-law moves in to help Charles raise his teenage daughter. Until he finds a suitable new wife. Ex parishioners just show up to ask for worldly and spiritual advice. And against his better judgement Spud gets involved. When Pastor Charles gets pulled in ALL directions, and is at the end of his wit he cries out'_Hep Me Jesus_ (qv)".::Frank Mitchell
